rows.label: qev026902_MSG0001
rows.name:
Your fight with that Ganglion flying fortress must have
been really intense, correct?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0002
rows.name:
And I'm sure a lot of what's left is is probably wrecked
past any any hope of repair, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0003
rows.name:
But some of it has to still be usable, maybe?
So if you can finish the salvage job, it would be great.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0004
rows.name: Oh, you're back? You work quick, don't you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0005
rows.name: Can I see what you found out there?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0006
rows.name:
Mmm... This is the cockpit block... Here's the engine...
This looks like part of a drive system, but...
Huh. Maybe not? What is this thing?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0007
rows.name:
Hmm... Strange. So so strange...?
...AH HA!
...Wait, no.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0008
rows.name: Sounds like you've got yourself a satisfied customer.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0009
rows.name:
You're pretty good, tiger! You and I could go places,
if you ever wanted to team up. Satisfaction guaranteed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0010
rows.name: What sort of satisfaction depends on what you're into...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0011
rows.name: Oh, THAT'S what that is? Of course![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0012
rows.name:
Yeesh! You startled me, you little maniac!
And I was just getting to the good part.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0013
rows.name:
Sorry. I just couldn't wrap my head around what
this device was for, you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0014
rows.name:
But if you step back and stop thinking like a Ma-non,
it it probably becomes fairly obvious, doesn't it?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0015
rows.name:
This reroutes any unused energy from the engine to
boost the output of what I'm guessing is a weapons
system, you see?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0016
rows.name:
Which is something that a Ma-non just wouldn't ever
think to to to do.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0017
rows.name:
Not that we couldn't, of course. It's just that none of
of us really care about weapons, right? Er, at all?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0018
rows.name:
When it comes to making things fly or or move fast,
I don't think there are any better engineers in the
entire galaxy![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0019
rows.name:
But if all you care about is breaking things,
then you should probably talk to the Ganglion,
you know?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0020
rows.name:
As a technophile, it's all pretty captivating, isn't it?
But but when I think about what it's actually USED for,
I get a cold tingle down my back.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0021
rows.name:
Well, sure, but we're going to have to keep fighting
these thingsâ€”and preferably winning.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0022
rows.name:
Sitting around talking about how amazing or
distressing it is doesn't help us much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0023
rows.name:
A fair point, I guess? I'll put a rush on analyzing this
salvage and apply it to upgrading and developing new
weapons right away, all right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0024
rows.name: We Ma-non still aren't fans of weapons, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0025
rows.name:
Well, this isn't the time to be picky, I guess?
So we'll do whatever we can.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev026902_MSG0026
rows.name:
Our technological revolution is just getting started,
but I hope that maybe you'll enjoy the next thing our
labs cook up?[ST:wait ]
